rules.natural: Person1 has the authorization to submit the manuscript or person2 has the authorization to submit the manuscript.
Provided that reviewer1 is invited to review publication1, editor1 is assigned to publication1.
Whenever reviewer2 is invited to review publication1, editor1 is assigned to publication1.
If reviewer1 accepts to review publication1, then reviewer1 has been invited to review publication1.
Reviewer1 accepts to review publication1 or reviewer2 accepts to review publication1.
Under the condition that reviewer2 accepts to review publication1, reviewer2 has been invited to review publication1.
If person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, then payment of the publication fee is processed for person2.
Person1 agrees to the copyright transfer or person2 agrees to the copyright transfer.
Under the condition that person2 agrees to the copyright transfer, publication1 is successful.
Whenever payment of the publication fee is processed for person1, publication1 is successful.
The payment of the publication fee is disputed by person1 or, if payment is processed for person2, then it is processed for person1.
Payment of the publication fee is disputed by person2 or it is not the case that payment is disputed by person1.
Provided that person2 has the authorization to submit the manuscript, publication1 is successful.
If legal action is threatened by person1, then legal action is threatened by person2.
A settlement is offered by person1 to person2 or a settlement is offered by person2 to person1.
Whenever a settlement is offered by person2 to person1, legal action is not threatened by person2.
If the settlement from person1 to person2 is accepted, then, provided that a settlement is offered by person1 to person2, legal action is not threatened by person2.
Provided that the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted, then, if a settlement is offered by person1 to person2, legal action is not threatened by person2.
Under the condition that the conflict regarding publication1 is resolved, publication1 is delayed.
The conflict regarding publication1 is resolved or the conflict regarding publication1 has escalated.
Provided that the conflict regarding publication1 has escalated, the settlement from person1 to person2 is accepted or the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted.
If publication1 proceeds, then the settlement from person1 to person2 is accepted or the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted.
Whenever publication1 is delayed, publication1 proceeds.
Funding for publication1 is secured or funding for publication1 is lost.
If funding for publication1 is lost, then, whenever the manuscript is approved, it is not rejected.
Whenever the ethics committee approves publication1, publication1 has obtained ethical approval.
The ethics committee approves publication1 or the ethics committee rejects publication1.
Provided that the ethics committee rejects publication1, then, if funding is secured, whenever the manuscript is approved, it is not rejected.
The manuscript for publication1 is withdrawn or, if the manuscript is revised, then it is published.
Under the condition that the final version of the manuscript for publication1 is submitted, the manuscript for publication1 is published.
Whenever plagiarism is detected in publication1, plagiarism in publication1 is confirmed.
If the investigation into publication1 is concluded, then sanctions are imposed on publication1.
Whenever person1 is cleared regarding publication1, then, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.
Person1 is cleared regarding publication1 or person2 is cleared regarding publication1.
If the reputation of person1 is restored, then, under the condition that person2 is cleared, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.
The reputation of person1 is restored or the reputation of person2 is restored.
Whenever the reputation of person2 is restored, then, provided that person2 is cleared, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.
Under the condition that an invoice for the publication fee is sent to person1, payment of the publication fee is processed for person1.
The invoice for the publication fee is disputed by person1 or, if person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, an invoice is sent to person1.
Provided that person1 receives funding from grant1, the manuscript for publication1 is accepted.
Person1 receives funding from grant1 or person2 receives funding from grant1.
If payment of the publication fee is received from person1, then payment of the publication fee is processed for person1.
Whenever a receipt for the publication fee is issued to person1, payment of the publication fee has been received from person1.
If the financial records for publication1 are updated, then accounting for publication1 is complete.
The financial records for publication1 are updated or the financial records for publication1 are pending.

There is a financial discrepancy in publication1 or, if accounting is complete, then publication1 is ready for audit.
Under the condition that publication1 has passed the financial audit, there is no financial discrepancy in publication1.
Negotiation between person1 and person2 is successful or negotiation between person2 and person1 is successful.
Provided that negotiation between person2 and person1 is successful, the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted.
Whenever person2 receives funding from grant1, the manuscript for publication1 is not rejected.
Under the condition that an agreement has been signed by person1 and person2, then, if negotiation is successful, the settlement is accepted.
Legal mediation has been initiated for publication1 or, if an agreement is not signed by person1 and person2, then an agreement is signed by person2 and person1.
If the manuscript for publication1 has been submitted, then publication1 is successful.
Provided that editor1 is assigned to publication1, then, if the manuscript is not submitted, the manuscript is published.
If it is not the case that if person1 has authorization then publication1 is successful, then the manuscript is rejected.
If it is not the case that if plagiarism is detected then plagiarism is not confirmed, then the investigation is concluded.

(A45 → (A43 → A41)).natural: Provided that person2 is cleared regarding publication1, then, whenever sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.

(A46 → (A45 → (A43 → A41))).natural: If the reputation of person1 is restored, then, under the condition that person2 is cleared, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.

(A46 ∨ A47).natural: The reputation of person1 is restored or the reputation of person2 is restored.

(A47 → (A45 → (A43 → A41))).natural: Whenever the reputation of person2 is restored, then, provided that person2 is cleared, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.

(A48 → A16).natural: Under the condition that an invoice for the publication fee is sent to person1, payment of the publication fee is processed for person1.

(A49 ∨ (A14 → A48)).natural: The invoice for the publication fee is disputed by person1 or, if person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, an invoice is sent to person1.

(A5 → A4).natural: Provided that person1 receives funding from grant1, the manuscript for publication1 is accepted.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: Person1 receives funding from grant1 or person2 receives funding from grant1.

(A50 → A16).natural: If payment of the publication fee is received from person1, then payment of the publication fee is processed for person1.

(A51 → A50).natural: Whenever a receipt for the publication fee is issued to person1, payment of the publication fee has been received from person1.

(A52 → (A14 → A51)).natural: Under the condition that the financial records for publication1 are updated, then, if person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, a receipt is issued to person1.

(A52 → A54).natural: If the financial records for publication1 are updated, then accounting for publication1 is complete.

(A52 ∨ A53).natural: The financial records for publication1 are updated or the financial records for publication1 are pending.

(A53 → (A14 → A51)).natural: Provided that the financial records for publication1 are pending, then, whenever person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, a receipt is issued to person1.

(A54 → (A14 → A51)).natural: If accounting for publication1 is complete, then, under the condition that person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, a receipt is issued to person1.

(A54 → A55).natural: Whenever accounting for publication1 is complete, publication1 is ready for audit.

(A55 → (A14 → A51)).natural: Provided that publication1 is ready for audit, then, if person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, a receipt is issued to person1.

(A56 ∨ (A54 → A55)).natural: There is a financial discrepancy in publication1 or, if accounting is complete, then publication1 is ready for audit.

(A57 → ¬A56).natural: Under the condition that publication1 has passed the financial audit, there is no financial discrepancy in publication1.

(A58 → A24).natural: If negotiation between person1 and person2 is successful, then the settlement from person1 to person2 is accepted.

(A58 ∨ A59).natural: Negotiation between person1 and person2 is successful or negotiation between person2 and person1 is successful.

(A59 → A25).natural: Provided that negotiation between person2 and person1 is successful, the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted.

(A6 → ¬A3).natural: Whenever person2 receives funding from grant1, the manuscript for publication1 is not rejected.

(A60 → (A58 → A24)).natural: Under the condition that an agreement has been signed by person1 and person2, then, if negotiation is successful, the settlement is accepted.

(A62 ∨ (¬A60 → A61)).natural: Legal mediation has been initiated for publication1 or, if an agreement is not signed by person1 and person2, then an agreement is signed by person2 and person1.

(A7 → G).natural: If the manuscript for publication1 has been submitted, then publication1 is successful.

(A9 → (¬A7 → A8)).natural: Provided that editor1 is assigned to publication1, then, if the manuscript is not submitted, the manuscript is published.

(¬(A1 → G) → A3).natural: If it is not the case that if person1 has authorization then publication1 is successful, then the manuscript is rejected.

(¬(A39 → ¬A40) → A41).natural: Whenever it is not the case that if plagiarism is detected then plagiarism is not confirmed, an investigation is opened.

(¬(A39 → ¬A40) → A42).natural: If it is not the case that if plagiarism is detected then plagiarism is not confirmed, then the investigation is concluded.

(¬(A39 → ¬A40) → ¬A41).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if plagiarism is detected then plagiarism is not confirmed, it is not the case that an investigation is opened.

(¬(¬A7 → A38) → A39).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the manuscript is not submitted then the final version is submitted, plagiarism is detected.

(¬A60 → A61).natural: If an agreement is not signed by person1 and person2, then an agreement is signed by person2 and person1.

(¬A60 → ¬A61).natural: Provided that an agreement is not signed by person1 and person2, then it is not the case that an agreement is signed by person2 and person1.

(¬A7 → A36).natural: Whenever the manuscript for publication1 is not submitted, the manuscript for publication1 is revised.

(¬A7 → A38).natural: If the manuscript for publication1 is not submitted, then the final version of the manuscript for publication1 is submitted.

(¬A7 → A8).natural: Under the condition that the manuscript for publication1 is not submitted, the manuscript for publication1 is published.

(¬G → A20).natural: Provided that publication1 is not successful, legal action is threatened by person1.

¬A18.natural: It is not the case that the payment of the publication fee is disputed by person1.

¬A19.natural: It is not the case that the payment of the publication fee is disputed by person2.

¬A21.natural: Legal action is not threatened by person2.
